00040 #ifndef eventcollision_cpp
00041 #define eventcollision_cpp

00043 #include "actorcontainerbase.h"
00044 #include "eventcollision.h"

00049 namespace phys {
00050     EventCollision::EventCollision()
00051     {
00052         ActorA=NULL;
00053         ActorB=NULL;
00054         LocalALocation=Vector3(0,0,0);
00055         LocalBLocation=Vector3(0,0,0);
00056         WorldLocation=Vector3(0,0,0);
00057         Impulse=0;
00058     }
00059 
00060     EventCollision::EventCollision(ActorBase* actora, ActorBase* actorb, Vector3 localAlocation, Vector3 localBlocation, Vector3 worldlocation, Real impulse)
00061     {
00062         ActorA=actora;
00063         ActorB=actorb;
00064         LocalALocation=localAlocation;
00065         LocalBLocation=localBlocation;
00066         WorldLocation=worldlocation;
00067         Impulse=impulse;
00068     }
00069 
00070     EventCollision::EventCollision(const EventCollision& Other)
00071     {
00072         ActorA=Other.ActorA;
00073         ActorB=Other.ActorB;
00074         LocalALocation=Other.LocalALocation;
00075         LocalBLocation=Other.LocalBLocation;
00076         WorldLocation=Other.WorldLocation;
00077         Impulse=Other.Impulse;
00078     }
00079 
00080     EventCollision::~EventCollision()
00081     {
00082     }
00083 
00084     EventBase::EventType EventCollision::GetType() const
00085     {
00086         return EventBase::Collision;
00087     }
00088 }

00090 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00091 // Class External << Operators for streaming or assignment
00092 #ifdef PHYSXML
00093 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::EventCollision& Ev)
00094 {
00095     stream  << "<EventCollision Version=\"1\" Impulse=\"" << Ev.Impulse << "\" ActorA=\"" << Ev.ActorA->GetName() << "\" ActorB=\"" << Ev.ActorB->GetName() << "\" >"
00096             <<  Ev.WorldLocation
00097             << "</EventCollision>";
00098     return stream;
00099 }
00100 
00101 std::istream& PHYS_LIB operator >> (std::istream& stream, phys::EventCollision& Ev)
00102 {
00103     phys::String OneTag( phys::xml::GetOneTag(stream) );
00104     std::auto_ptr<phys::xml::Document> Doc( phys::xml::PreParseClassFromSingleTag("phys::", "EventCollision", OneTag) );
00105 
00106     Doc->GetFirstChild() >> Ev;
00107 
00108     return stream;
00109 }
00110 
00111 void operator >> (const phys::xml::Node& OneNode, phys::EventCollision& Ev)
00112 {
00113     if ( phys::String(OneNode.Name())==phys::String("EventCollision"))
00114     {
00115         if(OneNode.GetAttribute("Version").AsInt() == 1)
00116         {
00117 
00118             Ev.ActorA=phys::World::GetWorldPointer()->GetActorManager()->FindActor(OneNode.GetAttribute("ActorA").AsString());
00119             Ev.ActorB=phys::World::GetWorldPointer()->GetActorManager()->FindActor(OneNode.GetAttribute("ActorB").AsString());
00120             Ev.Impulse=OneNode.GetAttribute("Impulse").AsReal();
00121 
00122             if(OneNode.GetFirstChild())
00123             {
00124                 OneNode.GetFirstChild() >> Ev.WorldLocation;
00125             }else{
00126                 throw(phys::Exception("Normal not found while parsing phys::EventCollision"));
00127             }
00128 
00129         }else{
00130             throw( phys::Exception("Incompatible XML Version for EventCollision: Not Version 1"));
00131         }
00132     }else{
00133         throw( phys::Exception(phys::StringCat("Attempting to deserialize a EventCollision, found a ", OneNode.Name())));
00134     }
00135 }
00136 #endif // \PHYSXML

00138 #endif
